<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs=""
>
[Putrescent Glob](/Equipment.aspx?ID=790)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from The Slithering</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Slithering](/Sources.aspx?ID=41) pg. 61</row>

**Price** 65 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to  a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You damage a creature that is [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) with a Strike using the affixed weapon

**Requirement** You are an expert with the affixed weapon.
</row>

</column>

---

This repulsive, hairy glob dangles from the end of your weapon. When you activate the _putrescent glob_, the creature you damaged must succeed at a DC 23 Fortitude save or its [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) condition increases to sickened 2, and it can't reduce its sickened condition until the end of its next turn. On a critical failure, it's also [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) until the end of its next turn.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

requirement: You are an expert with the affixed weapon.
